\"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n       \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n        planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n       \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n        planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new        planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n       \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new       \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n       \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n     ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n        planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n        planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new \"/Library/applyOnlineNavItems.lbi\" -->\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \u003Cscript>\n\n        function ApplyMenuBuilder() {\n        }\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getMenuData = function (\n            planningLabel1,\n            planningUrl1,\n            planningLabel2,\n            planningUrl2,\n            planningLabel3,\n            planningUrl3,\n            buildingControlLabel1,\n            buildingControlUrl1,\n            buildingControlLabel2,\n            buildingControlUrl2,\n            buildingControlLabel3,\n            buildingControlUrl3,\n            buildingStandardsLabel1,\n            buildingStandardsUrl1,\n            buildingStandardsLabel2,\n            buildingStandardsUrl2,\n            buildingStandardsLabel3,\n            buildingStandardsUrl3,\n            licensingLabel1,\n            licensingUrl1,\n            licensingLabel2,\n            licensingUrl2,\n            licensingLabel3,\n            licensingUrl3\n        ) {\n            var modules = [];\n\n            var planning = this.getModuleJson('Planning', planningLabel1, planningUrl1, planningLabel2, planningUrl2, planningLabel3, planningUrl3);\n            var buildingControl = this.getModuleJson('Building Control', buildingControlLabel1, buildingControlUrl1, buildingControlLabel2, buildingControlUrl2, buildingControlLabel3, buildingControlUrl3);\n            var buildingStandards = this.getModuleJson('Building Standards', buildingStandardsLabel1, buildingStandardsUrl1, buildingStandardsLabel2, buildingStandardsUrl2, buildingStandardsLabel3, buildingStandardsUrl3);\n            var licensing = this.getModuleJson('Licensing', licensingLabel1, licensingUrl1, licensingLabel2, licensingUrl2, licensingLabel3, licensingUrl3);\n\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, planning);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingControl);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, buildingStandards);\n            this.pushIfNotNull(modules, licensing);\n\n            var data = {};\n            data.Version = \"1.0\";\n            data.Default = modules;\n            return data;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getModuleJson = function (moduleName, label1, url1, label2, url2, label3, url3) {\n            var links = [];\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label1, url1));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label2, url2));\n            this.pushIfNotNull(links, this.getLinkJson(label3, url3));\n\n            if (links.length === 0) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            var module = {};\n            module.name = moduleName;\n            module.menu = links;\n            return module;\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.getLinkJson = function (label, url) {\n            if (!label || label === \"\" || label === \"null\" || !url || url === \"\" || url === \"null\") {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return {\"name\": label, \"url\": url};\n        };\n\n        ApplyMenuBuilder.prototype.pushIfNotNull = function (array, item) {\n            if (item != null) {\n                array.push(item);\n            }\n        };\n\n        $(document).ready(function () {\n            var applyMenuData = new ApplyMenuBuilder().getMenuData(\n                \"Planning Portal\",\n                \"https://www.planningportal.co.uk\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\",\n                \"\");\n\n            if (applyMenuData.Default.length === 0){\n                if (window.console) console.log('No data given with which to construct the Apply Online menu.')\n                hideApplyMenu();\n            }\n            loadApplyMenu('Default', applyMenuData);\n        });\n    \u003C/script>\n\n    \u003Cli id=\"apply\" class=\"main\">\n
